name: Decision Matrix Notion Template
description: Make everyday personal/professional decisions using Decision MatrixHow often do we find ourselves in a dilemma of selecting one thing over the other, and sometimes it is virtually impossible to make up our mind. For example, you want to buy a mobile or a car, decide where to go for the vacation or which supplier to select for your business and so on. This template will help you in making such decisions.A decision matrix is a simple but effective tool to evaluate different alternatives or options
features: Reducing decision fatigue; Reducing the guesswork from decision-making; Prioritizing criteria; Making informed decisions
